info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mobility-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for wireless mobility operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2016-2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Wireless
**Paths:** 43

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mobility-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mobility-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mobility-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mobility-oper.html)

ap-count.description:
Total number of APs reported by this device: this
         MC, or its peer MC or its MA

tunnel-type.description: Mobility control or data tunnel type information

id.description: ID for the policy of the anchor
